verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, my Fortress is He.
Jesus, my Fortress is He.
Jesus, my Fortress is He,
And He will not forsake me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He will never leave me.
Jesus, my Refuse is He.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cristo mi Roca es El
Cristo mi Roca es El
Cristo mi Roca es El
El no me desampara,
Cristo no me deja,
Cristo mi Roca es El.
Cristo mi amor.., mi vida.., mi fuerza.., mi todo.., etc.
